Load packages
```{r}
library(sf)
library(stars)
library(tmap)
```


```{r}
#| eval: false

# raster of global elevations
world_elevation <- read_stars(here::here("week1", "data", "worldelevation.tif"))

# country boundaries
world_vector <- read_sf(here::here("week1", "data", "worldvector.gpkg"))

# major cities
world_cities <- read_sf(here::here("week1", "data", "worldcities.gpkg"))

```
